page.title: 01Leonardslee Gardens
page.content:
Mr Loder owns 300 acres of land. He has many varieties of tree, like oak, chestnut and birch, and 5000 different kinds of flowers. The most popular flower is the {rhododendron.}The gardens cover 80 acres. The gardens started as a woodland landscape, and then Mr Loder's grandfather started to grow rhododendrons about 100 years ago.Mr Robin Loder has been in charge of Leonardslee for four years.He has 4 full time workers. Leonardslee gardens are open to the public every day in the spring and at weekends in summer and autumn.
by Victoria Beale
